name: Slider (itch) (Tuja)
description:
Slider is a simple platformer game made for the NOKIA 3310 JAM 5.

CONTROLS:
MOVE LEFT - left arrow or a key.
MOVE RIGHT - right arrow or d key.
JUMP - up arrow, w key or b key.
SLIDE - down arrow, s key or f key.

FULLSCREEN - F1 key.
VOLUME DOWN - F2 key.
VOLUME UP - F3 key.
EXIT - F4 key.

The game was made in C++, using SDL2.
